alert.note: Alert for Mason; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 10 at 3:38AM EDT until September 11 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Mason and Oceana counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will shift from the south to the west this afternoon, then become northerly by this evening. The north sides of north piers will be particularly dangerous for swimming. This includes beaches such as Stearns Park in Ludington and Mears State Park in Pentwater.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
